alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Greene; Hamblen; Hawkins; Jefferson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 14 at 2:23PM CDT until April 14 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Hawkins County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Jefferson County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Cocke County in east Tennessee... Western Greene County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 323 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Newport, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morristown, Greeneville, Newport, Baneberry, Parrottsville, Mosheim, Bulls Gap, Caney Branch, Romeo and Bybee. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 427 and 441. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 13 and 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
